Text:
I now have all 21 books seeded.  I hope you enjoy them as much as I do. 

Click on my name istrahd above and it will take you to a download link to all of them.

I, for one, certainly admire and appreciate your efforts. I have read all the books in the series at least twice & have collected the set in audiobook format from various sources over the past few years.  There are at least 3 releases that I know of, each with a different reader.  I am seeking to complete my collection of that version of the series which is read by Simon Vance.  I would therefore very much appreciate it if you would append the narrator's name to each of your uploads so that I can avoid wasting time & bandwidth d/ling versions I do not want.  Thank you.

hey bro, I have been looking for a good copy of this forever!  I know I came to the table late but can you please, for the love of all that is good and holy, seed just a bit?  Too me this while because I was listening to 1 - 19! ']

Anyway, from you or anyone else a seed would be appreciated  :)  Cant wait to hear Jack so thanks!
